docs.lead_paragraph: DEARBORN, Mich. ORVILLE HUBBARD is one smart politician. A soft medicine ball of a man, with hoglike chin and jowls, hair slicked straight back, Hubbard is a 65-year-old, 300-pound Northern redneck. Plain-talking and hard-swearing, he bases his politics on the old sure-fire Southern strategy: give the people what they want, and remind them of it at every opportunity.

headline.main: Mayor Hubbard Gives Dearborn What It Wants -- and Then Some; Mayor Hubbard of Dearborn

docs.abstract: W Serrin article on 27-yr autocratic rule in Dearborn, personal caprices that have kept him in power with strong voter support; illus
